title: Simulation-based Education for Early Childhood Learning Design and Improving Teacher Awareness: A Learning Research Foundation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theory and understanding of language education methodologies
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education designing early childhood learning activities in VR simulation environments and analyzing changes in teachers' perceptions

learning_goals: VR-based early childhood language learning scenarios can be designed by applying the Learning Study methodology.
The gap between actual achievement of early childhood learners and teachers' expectations can be analyzed in a simulation environment.
Strategies can be developed to adjust teachers' expected performance levels based on formative assessment results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
